name: WALLSLIDE
description: Wallslide is all about tight controls, high speeds and big jumps.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 560 ti / AMD HD 7850 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 201 MB available space
